reactor.io.net

Interface NetChannel.ConsumerSpec

  • Enclosing interface:
    NetChannel<IN,OUT>

    public static interface NetChannel.ConsumerSpec
    Spec class for assigning multiple event handlers on a channel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NetChannel.ConsumerSpec close(Runnable onClose)
      Assign a Runnable to be invoked when the channel is closed.
      NetChannel.ConsumerSpec readIdle(long idleTimeout, Runnable onReadIdle)
      Assign a Runnable to be invoked when reads have become idle for the given timeout.
      NetChannel.ConsumerSpec writeIdle(long idleTimeout, Runnable onWriteIdle)
      Assign a Runnable to be invoked when writes have become idle for the given timeout.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        NetChannel.ConsumerSpec close(Runnable onClose)
        Assign a Runnable to be invoked when the channel is closed.
        Parameters:
        onClose - the close event handler
        Returns:
        this

      • readIdle

        NetChannel.ConsumerSpec readIdle(long idleTimeout,
                                 Runnable onReadIdle)
        Assign a Runnable to be invoked when reads have become idle for the given timeout.
        Parameters:
        idleTimeout - the idle timeout
        onReadIdle - the idle timeout handler
        Returns:
        this

      • writeIdle

        NetChannel.ConsumerSpec writeIdle(long idleTimeout,
                                  Runnable onWriteIdle)
        Assign a Runnable to be invoked when writes have become idle for the given timeout.
        Parameters:
        idleTimeout - the idle timeout
        onWriteIdle - the idle timeout handler
        Returns:
        this
